entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog at times. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 8. POP 30%
